ygData.subject: Re: The madness explained!
ygData.msgSnippet: Sarcasm is rarely easy to pick up in text. Maybe you should use your little =) thing more often. Krukhan = loud mouth ass ..but wait... =) just kidding I can
ygData.messageBody:
Sarcasm is rarely easy to pick up in text.
Maybe you should use your little =) thing more often.

Krukhan = loud mouth ass ..but wait... =)
just kidding

I can appreciate jokes very much, but with the
mentally retarded things Verant has done since day
one, there was no reason to believe that this wasnt
true...think about it.

--- Krukhan Garabash <krukhan@...> wrote:
> i guess i need to start using [sarcasm][/sarcasm]
> tags. like this.
>
> [sarcasm type="brad comment" style="silly"]"The no
> drop stat change is
> intentional, to balance the power of the armor." -
> Brad[/sarcasm]
>
> was a JOKE!
>
> hence the "good impression?" line immediately after
> it.
>
> kg
>
